show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Fed-Influenced Japanese Money-Printing Gone Beserk
content:
Japan this morning announced more money-printing and promised to throw the money into the local and foreign markets in... <!--more--> a determined but futile effort to ‘force’ inflation up.
The US at the same time is terminating its own ridiculous and failed experiment with quantitatitatitative easing (what a ridiculous expression!
).
Fed is trying to pretend they are in charge!
Listen to Thom Hartmann talking about poverty in America.
Paul Craig Roberts’s comment on Vladimir Putin, following up from my long quote on Monday from a piece by Dmitri Orlov.
More on the TPP and the TTIP (European edition).
Chinese announce remnimbi convertibility.
A dramatic rendition of the Fed statement curtailing QE from yesterday.
